message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this incredible product. Given its value, I'm asking for $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I can't let this go for less than $1,350,000. This product truly is exceptional, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand that the product is exceptional, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $1,350,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,150,000. This is my final offer.
